content: simple and polished with its garter brim faux seam and neatly placed crown decreases that offer the perfect amount of slouch this hat and don t forget the mitts will keep you cozy and stylish as you head out for the day *** **finished measurements** hat approx 20 / 51 cm circumference x 9 / 23 cm tall mitts approx 8 / 20 5 cm circumference x 6 5 / 16 5 cm tall **yarn** hat approx 135 yds / 123 m of worsted weight yarn mitts approx 85 yds / 77 m of worsted weight yarn *first sample featured in * 2 skeins of plucky knitter halo worsted 100% cashmere 115 yd / 105 m per 60 g in royal icing for hat 1 skein of plucky knitter halo worsted 100% cashmere 115 yd / 105 m per 60 g in royal icing for mitts *last sample featured in * 2 skeins of plucky knitter halo worsted 100% cashmere 115 yd / 105 m per 60 g in hoodie *other recommended plucky knitter bases * groovy primo aran scholar snug worsted trusty yakpaca **gauge** 18 sts and 30 rnds = 4 / 10 cm in stockinette stitch **needles** needles listed is suggested always take time to swatch gauge needle hat size us 7 4 5 mm 16 / 40 cm circular needle and dpns double pointed needles mitts size us 7 4 5 mm dpns smaller needle hat size us 5 3 75 mm 16 / 40 cm circular needle mitts size us 5 3 75 mm dpns **tools** stitch marker removable stitch marker for mitts and tapestry needle **notes** hat is knit in-the-round from the bottom up mitts are knit in-the-round from the cuff to thumb hole then knit at for thumb hole then knit in-the-round to end
